foreignData.name: Goblinvandale
foreignData.text: {R}: Zerstöre ein Artefakt Deiner Wahl, welches der verteidigende Spieler kontrolliert. Der Goblinvandale fügt in diesem Zug keinen Kampfschaden zu. Benutze diese Fähigkeit nur, wenn der Goblinvandale angreift und nicht geblockt wird und nur einmal pro Zug.

mainBoard.name: Goblin Vandal
mainBoard.originalText:
oo
R Destroy target artifact defending player controls. Goblin Vandal deals no combat damage this turn. Use this ability only if Goblin Vandal is attacking and unblocked and only once each turn.

rulings.text: If the defending player controls no artifacts that you can target, the ability doesn’t go on the stack and you can’t pay {R}.

An ability that triggers when something “attacks and isn’t blocked” triggers in the declare blockers step after blockers are declared if (1) that creature is attacking and (2) no creatures are declared to block it. It will trigger even if that creature was put onto the battlefield attacking rather than having been declared as an attacker in the declare attackers step.

mainBoard.text: Whenever Goblin Vandal attacks and isn't blocked, you may pay {R}. If you do, destroy target artifact defending player controls and Goblin Vandal assigns no combat damage this turn.

foreignData.name: Feuersturm
foreignData.text: Bestimme X Karten aus Deiner Hand und wirf diese ab: Der Feuersturm fügt X verschiedenen Kreaturen und/oder Spielern Deiner Wahl X Schadenspunkte zu.

mainBoard.name: Firestorm
mainBoard.originalText: Choose and discard X cards: Firestorm deals X damage to each of X target creatures and/or players.

rulings.text: For example, if you discard four cards, you must target four different creatures and/or players. Firestorm will deal 4 damage to each of them.
The same permanent or player can’t be targeted more than once.
The value of X can’t exceed the number of cards in your hand or the number of available legal targets, whichever is smaller. X can be 0.

mainBoard.text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, discard X cards.
Firestorm deals X damage to each of X targets.

foreignData.name: Einäscherung
foreignData.text: Die Einäscherung fügt einem Spieler oder einer Kreatur Deiner Wahl 3 Schadenspunkte zu. Eine Kreatur, der durch Einäscherung Schaden zugefügt wurde, kann in diesem Zug nicht regenerieren.

mainBoard.name: Incinerate
mainBoard.originalText: Incinerate deals 3 damage to target creature or player. A creature damaged by Incinerate cannot regenerate this turn.

rulings.text: Regeneration abilities that would affect that creature can still be activated; they just won’t do anything. The creature can’t be regenerated for any reason, even if an effect other than Incinerate would deal lethal damage to it or otherwise destroy it.

mainBoard.text: Incinerate deals 3 damage to any target. A creature dealt damage this way can't be regenerated this turn.

mainBoard.name: Cone of Flame
mainBoard.originalText: Choose three target creatures and/or players. Cone of Flame deals 1 damage to the first, 2 damage to the second, and 3 damage to the third.

rulings.text: Each of the three targets must be different. If there aren’t three different legal targets available, you can’t cast the spell.
If one or two of Cone of Flame’s targets are illegal when it resolves, you can’t change how much damage will be dealt to the remaining legal targets.

mainBoard.text: Cone of Flame deals 1 damage to any target, 2 damage to another target, and 3 damage to a third target.

foreignData.name: Herz von Bogardan
foreignData.text:
Kumulative Versorgung-2
Wenn die kumulative Versorgung für das Herz von Bogardan einem Spieler Deiner Wahl und allen Kreaturen, die er kontrolliert, Schadenspunkte in der Höhe der für das Herz von Bogardan zuletzt bezahlten kumulativen Versorgung zu.

mainBoard.name: Heart of Bogardan
mainBoard.originalText:
Cumulative upkeep o2
If Heart of Bogardan's cumulative upkeep cost is not paid, Heart of Bogardan deals damage equal to its last paid cumulative upkeep to target player and each creature he or she controls.

rulings.text: In other words, if you sacrifice Heart of Bogardan rather than pay its cumulative upkeep, X is equal to the amount of mana last spent to pay its cumulative upkeep.

mainBoard.text:
Cumulative upkeep {2} (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.)
When a player doesn't pay Heart of Bogardan's cumulative upkeep, Heart of Bogardan deals X damage to target player or planeswalker and each creature that player or that planeswalker's controller controls, where X is twice the number of age counters on Heart of Bogardan minus 2.
